name: TimeZone
signal_source: Remote workers report 'it's impossible to keep track of everyone's local time zone all the time' and 'time zones can be a bit puzzling'
description: Personal time zone coordinator for remote workers and travelers that eliminates scheduling confusion
target_user: Remote workers and frequent travelers who coordinate with teams across multiple time zones and make scheduling mistakes
pain_point_evidence: Users need to 'explicitly state the deadline in your time zone and your teammate's time zone to erase any chance of confusion'
core_loop: Add key contacts with time zones
differentiation: Personal coordination vs. team software, focuses on individual workflow rather than enterprise features
subscription_fit: Premium includes unlimited contacts, calendar integration, and travel automation

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic coordination, premium for advanced features and integrations
